com.google.crypto.tink.aead.internal

Class InsecureNonceChaCha20

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.aead.internal.InsecureNonceChaCha20

  • public class InsecureNonceChaCha20
extends Object
    A stream cipher, as described in RFC 8439 https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8439, section 2.4.

    This cipher is meant to be used to construct an AEAD with Poly1305.

      • nonceSizeInBytes

        public int nonceSizeInBytes()
        The size of the randomly generated nonces.

        ChaCha20 uses 12-byte nonces, but XChaCha20 use 24-byte nonces.
